snippet: The bye week will come in handy for New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady, who could use the rest after Miami defensive lineman Ndamukong Suh landed on his right ankle in Sunday's game....
lead_paragraph: The bye week will come in handy for New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady, who could use the rest after Miami defensive lineman Ndamukong Suh landed on his right ankle in Sunday's game.

headline.main: Brady to Have Treatment for Right Ankle but 'I've Had Worse'
headline.print_headline: Brady to Have Treatment for Right Ankle but 'I've Had Worse'
